desc: Bistro Gaston Homemade specialties from Burgundy Singapore, provide both restaurant and wine bar services. Committed to ensuring that the wine program is highly accessible, varied and exciting . We also offer Bistro Gaston Gift Card, Best French Food, best set lunch menu in Singapore and many more.

layout.text:
ENJOY YOUR FAVOURITE WINE
ON OUR TERRACE
ALL DAY LONG
PAIR IT WITH OUR SELECTION OF TAPAS
